description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 4a. Physical description: 15-23 lines per page; written in naskh in black on beige glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication in red, yellow, and green; catchwords and some marginal notes. Some smudging of text and damp staining. First leaf ragged on edges. Inserts between fol. 27-28, 72-73, 75-76. Incip.: ... الحمد لله وسلام ... وبعد فان کتابنا هذا مبنى على مقدمة واحد وعشرين بابا وخاتمة
author: Khālidī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, -1475 or 1476
abstract: Commentary on the Zaydī treatise by al-ʻUṣayfirī on inheritance law, Miftāḥ al-fāʼiḍ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ, followed by a supplement entitled "Kitāb al-waṣāyā" and chapters on mīrāth al-muṭallaqāt, ḍarb, and misāḥah. The volume also contains other texts and notes concerning inheritance law as well as several poems.
contents: 2. fol. 2a-2b: Hādhihi al-masāʼil / lil-faqīh ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad. Questions and answers concerning inheritance law.
3. fol. 3a-3b: [Poem in praise of the Prophet].

4. fol. 4a-150b: Kitāb Īḍāḥ al-ghāmiḍ al-kāshif li-maʻānī Miftāḥ al-fāʼiḍ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ. Poem attributed to al-Imām al-Mutawakkil ʻalá Allāh Yaḥyá Sharaf al-Dīn and notice concerning Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khālidī on fol. 4a. Text is followed by a poem by Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad al-Falakī and a notice concerning certain Qurʼānic sūrahs.
5. fol. 151a-153b: Mithāl mā fī ziyādat al-sihām / Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn Ṣalāḥ ibn Muḥammad Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Falakī. With notes in red by Muḥammad ibn Ṣalāḥ al-Falakī.
7. fol. 154b-157a: Kitāb al-waṣāyā. Extract from Miftāḥ al-farāʼiḍ.
